attributes.additional_details: Ben Judge, student of Queens College in Taunton has definatly what it takes to be prime minister. His way of speaking, his aura and his positive influence he has on his fellow human being is impressive. His political knowledge is great and after going to university for further studies and experience he will be an optimal candidate for a prime minister in the future to come.   There will be a time i assure you, when his name will spread and be known as well as many others in his role!!
